climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: DOUBLE COMFORT THICK GEL WITH INCLUDED FOAM TOPPER - Sit Comfy Anywhere! We improved the cushion adding high density removable foam insert. Extra-thick extra large dual comrort (20" x 20" x 2") Gel Seat Cushion with removable 0.5" high density foam topper. Superior air column comfort and support for extended sitting, our gel seat cushion is thicker and firmer great for long sitting and road trip essentials for adults. The thick, large size makes our chair cushion the ideal car seat cushions for driving without feeling squishy. Excellent office chair gifts, staduims, travel and airplane seats & wheelchairs.

VERSATILE LARGE SIZE FEEL - The gel feels firm at first. This is by design. Give it time! Use the high-density foam piece included for extra floating comfort. The grid underneath you is for increased blood flow using pressure points helping reduce leg/buttocks tightness. Support can only be achieved by a more dense medical grade gel so it doesn't squish flat. Comfort redefined with our thick, supportive gel seat cushion, a thickness of 2 inch high gel density, this cushion provides unparalleled support. Versatile for couch cushion or coccyx cushion for tailbone pain relief.

FEEL THE CHILL - Innovation for wheelchairs helping with air flow utilizing cooling gel columns, ZenBloks seat cushion is designed with breathability and more firm comfort in mind. Ideal as an office chair and desk chair cushion or as a sciatica pain relief pillow, our tailbone relief cushion is your perfect partner for long hours of sitting. The thick honeycomb gel design not only promotes airflow but also creates a unique, tactile sensation that can be relaxing and refreshing.

DURABLE AND NON-SLIP - Thoughtfully designed with a non-slip bottom, our gel cushions prevent sliding while you sit. Made with long-lasting medical grade gel, our cushions retain their shape and deliver consistent support, even after extended use.

EASY CLEANING WITH EFFORTLESS COMFORT - ZenBloks seat cushions feature a detachable seat cover for easy cleaning, ensuring a fresh and hygienic seating experience with each use. Say goodbye to discomfort with our office chair and wheelchair cushions. Designed for long hours of sitting, our pressure relief cushion offers optimal support to alleviate pressure points.

UNIQUELY DESIGNED FOR A COOLING FEEL - Engineered differently from traditional foam cushions. The distinctive feel of the gel lines is intentional, for more airflow using air chambers under the cover - it's a feature, not a flaw. These cooling air columns give you a unique sensation to keep you cool, unlike foam, even during long periods of sitting. It's a revolutionary sitting experience that you won't find with foam or other common cushion materials. Embrace the feel, and enjoy the chill with

ZENBLOKS LIFETIME WARRANTY - We are here to help! Whether it's a gift or for yourself, we stand behind everything we make. We promise to create our gel seat cushion with attention to sitting, driving, wheelchair comfort, pain relief, travel ease, and durability—because we want you to love our products and enjoy long sitting as intended. If you aren't satisfied with the gel feel or seat cushion itself, contact us through Amazon for a 30 day full refund or exchange.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Extra Large Extra Thick Gel Seat Cushion For Office Chairs, Wheelchairs, Car Seat Driving, Stadium Seating And Airplane Travel Designed for Breathablility To Keep You Cool Experience a revolution in seating comfort with ZenBloks. Foam cushions have been a go-to for many, but sometimes keeping your bottom too warm for a comfy sitting experience. We decided to innovate. Extra large and extra thick. Enter ZenBloks gel seat cushions - a game-changer in personal comfort. Our unique design integrates gel lines and air chambers beneath the surface, a feature intentionally crafted to create a distinctive sitting experience especially helpful for wheelchair seating. It's not your usual cushion feel - it's a solution we've engineered for those who found traditional foam didn't quite meet their needs. These cooling air columns designed to keep you refreshed during prolonged sitting periods, a feature often missed in standard foam cushions. We thoroughly test our products to redefine comfort by offering an alternative where traditional methods fell short. Embrace the ZenBloks revolution and discover a new standard of cool, comfortable sitting.
Perfect For Wheelchair, Stadium Seating, Office Chair, Airplane, Car Seats For Driving Long Trips
Extra Thick Density Gel Seat Cushion Never Squishy
Relieve Pressure Points Helping Low Back Pain, Sciatica, Tailbone, Coccyx and Legs
Cooling Gel Seat Cushion Design With Excellent Air Flow For Maximum Breathability

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Large and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is large enough to mostly fill the seat of a big man's office chair and is firm and supportive. The 20" length from seat back to seat front is perfect but I would like if the width was about 24" side to side to better fit in the seat. On a PU leather chair the cushion tends to drift from side to side and the extra 4" width would tend to cut down on this drift. The gel is adaptive to the user but a bit thicker memory foam pad on top would cut down on feeling the gel cells underneath and would make it more comfortable. I've tried several different cushions and this one is, by far, the best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it! Excellent cushion with great comfort
reviews.reviewText: Excellent quality with extra thick gel !While sitting on it for a long day, this gel cushion design to allow air flow so it keeps my bottom cool with no pressure sores.I am very selective about the cushions, finally I found the ONE that I am in love with. Definitely worth the price ! This one will last a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars At last, a cushion large enough for my office chair
reviews.reviewText: Don't be fooled by the foam cushions that call themselves "extra large." Tis one is a full 20" X 20" and completely covers the seat of my chair and the seat of my car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This thing is huge!
reviews.reviewText: I really like this pillow. It is gynormous, comfy, and makes my office chair much nicer. It really helps relieve my tailbone, low back, and hip pain. It has a nice case with a handle and anti-slip sticky dots on the bottom. Inside it has a blue honeycomb gel pad with another smaller pad on top. I like it better without the extra pad (it’s a little too stiff for me with both pads). It is a little too long for my office chair, but it is still comfy on the back of my legs. It is a little pricey, but for the pain relief it is worth every penny. Overall a great pillow. Would make a nice gift too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Cushion!
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice cushion that provides a much needed, very comfortable sitting experience for many hours at a time. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too Stiff & Firm -- Needs More Flexibility
reviews.reviewText: I was really looking forward to this Gel Pad that appeared to be great quality and comfort. The minute I sat on it, I was very disappointed. Usually, gel products allow a bit of sinking into the cushion and then you feel the support all around on your tailbone, lower back and glutes.This gel cushion makes you feel like you're sitting up high and there is no "give" or flexibility to relax into to provide relief for sore tailbones and sciatica pain. This will probably end up being another cushion for our cats to sleep on since returning things to Amazon can be a hassle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the XL size and gel material as oposed to memory foam type seat cushions. You can tell that this will last a long time. Firm and holds me up well on my office chair. Reasonably priced. Will buy again.
